title: The First Amendment: Your Voice Matters
description: A 60-second journey through the First Amendment's protection of free speech, from colonial times to social media today.

sections.content: Hook: Imagine a world where you couldn't share your thoughts online...
sections.visual_prompt: Modern teenager looking at phone, then transitioning to colonial era
sections.audio_prompt: Background music: Suspenseful, modern beat transitioning to historical theme

sections.content: Context: In 1791, the First Amendment guaranteed our right to speak freely
sections.visual_prompt: Dramatic recreation of Constitutional Convention, close-up on First Amendment text

sections.content: Impact: Today, this right protects everything from social media posts to peaceful protests
sections.visual_prompt: Split screen showing historical protests and modern social media feeds
sections.audio_prompt: Music shift to empowering, contemporary beat

sections.content: Call to Action: How do you use your voice? Share your story below!
sections.visual_prompt: Text overlay with question, modern teens expressing themselves
